mapper.select: SELECT sys_menu.menu_authority FROM sys_role_menu left join sys_menu on sys_role_menu.menu_id = sys_menu.id left join sys_role on sys_role_menu.role_id = sys_role.id left join sys_user_role on sys_role.id = sys_user_role.role_id WHERE sys_menu.is_del = 0 and sys_menu.menu_status = 1 and sys_menu.menu_type = 'B' and sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId}
